aboutProject.heading: Ɛfa Dwumadi no ho
aboutProject.paragraph1: Orbital Temple yɛ adwini ne satellite a ne botaeɛ ne sɛ ɛbɛyɛ asɔredan a ɛka obiara ho koraa, a wɔasi wɔ baabi a afasuo biara ntumi nkɔ hɔ. Brazilni adwumfo Edson Pavoni, adwumfo a ɔhyɛ Inumeráveis Nkaedi a ɛkɔɔ Brazilfo 6 biara mu 1 wɔ COVID ɔyaredɔm no mu no akyi na ɔyɛɛ adwuma yi, na ɛto nsa frɛ nnipa a wofi wiase nyinaa sɛ wɔmfa obi a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔkae no din mena. Wɔde saa din ahorow yi kɔ satellite bi a ɛkyinkyin so, na ɛma wonya nkaedum a wɔaboaboa ano.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Ɛdenam wɛbsaet bi a ɛwɔ kasa horow 136 mu so no, wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu no de wɔn ho hyɛ amanne foforo bi mu. Orbital Asɔredan no hwehwɛ nsɛmti a ɛfa nkabom, nkae, ne yɛn adesamma a yɛkyɛ ho, gye nea enti a honam fam asɔredan biara nni Asase so a ebetumi ama obiara akwaaba ankasa ho kyim, na ɛhyɛ nyansa sɛ ahunmu nkutoo ne beae biako pɛ a ebia nkabom a emu yɛ den wɔ hɔ.

aboutArtist.heading: Ɛfa Mfoniniyɛfo no ho
aboutArtist.paragraph1: Edson Pavoni yɛ Brazilni mfoniniyɛfo a n’akwantu no fii ase wɔ São Paulo mmɔnten so, faako a ohia ne basabasayɛ tebea bi na ɛhyehyɛɛ ne mfiase mfe no. Wɔ ɔman bi a na Kristosom de ɔkwan a ɛbɛma watumi atwe ne ho afi mmɔnten, nnubɔne, ne basabasayɛ ho ma mu no, Pavoni nyaa guankɔbea wɔ gyidi mu, asɛmti a akyiri yi, bere a ɔbɛyɛɛ obi a ɔkasa tia nyamesom mu ayayade no, na ɛbɛma wahu n’adwinni adeyɛ no.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Wɔ afe 2020 mu, wɔ COVID-19 ɔyaredɔm no mu no, Pavoni yɛɛ Inumeráveis (a wontumi nkan) , adwinni bi a ɛwɔ adwinni ne nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔ ntam. Adwuma no bisabisaa mmusua mpempem pii nsɛm na wɔkyerɛw wɔn a ɔyaredɔm no hweree wɔn no ho nsɛm, na ɛmaa baabi a wɔkae no boroo akontaabu ne akontaabu so. Wɔde saa nsɛm no yɛɛ anwensɛm, nnwom, ne nnwom a wɔde bɔ nnwom. Atesɛm nkrataa de edin ne abakɔsɛm ahorow no yɛɛ animdefo. Brazil nsoromma nyinaa te sɛ Fernanda Torres a wagye Oscar, ne nsoromma te sɛ Selton Melo, Eva Wilma, Camila Pitanga, Debora Secco, Tais Araujo ne Lazaro Ramos, ne afoforo pii kenkan saa nsɛm no wɔ ɔman television so. Adwuma no duu nnipa ɔpepem 32 nkyɛn, na Brazilfo mpanyimfo baanan biara mu biako. Ɛbɛyɛɛ ayaresa ntam nkitahodi, nkaedum a wɔaboaboa ano a wɔde kae ade.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Bere a yɛde awerɛhow bɔɔ nkɔmmɔ bɛboro mpem du akyi no, nhwɛso bi bae: sɛ yɛka obi a wawu ho asɛm a, yɛpaw wɔn asɛm no asinasin te sɛ nea yɛrekyerɛw krataa de kamfo paradise pon ano hwɛfo no. Yɛyɛ nea yebetumi biara de wɔn kɔ nea yegye di sɛ ɛyɛ ɔsoro. Saa adwuma yi kanyan ntease foforo: Yɛn gyidi ahorow a ɛfa nea ɔfata ɔsoro ho no na ɛkyerɛ wɔn a yegye tom anaasɛ yeyi wɔn fi mu wɔ Asase so no tẽẽ. Ná Portugalfo atubrafo a wɔwɔ Brazil no gye di sɛ Abibifo nni akra; saa gyidi no maa nkoasom yɛɛ nea ɛfata. Sɛ na woyɛ aborɔfo, sɛ wɔwoo wo wɔ baabi a ɛnteɛ anaasɛ wodɔ onipa a ɔmfata a, wɔda so ara, de besi nnɛ, wɔka kyerɛ wo sɛ wɔato ɔsoro apon mu ama wo. So daakye ho anisoadehu bi wɔ hɔ a pow a wɔpow nhyɛ no ma?
aboutArtist.paragraph4: Saa na wɔwoo Orbital Asɔredan no.

pressCoverage.heading: Wɔada no adi Wɔ / Press Coverage mu
pressCoverage.paragraph1: Wɔde nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔfo nsɛm ne nneɛma a ɛwom bɛka ho bere a wobetumi anya bi no. Sɛ wopɛ nsɛm a aba foforo a, yɛsrɛ wo, di yɛn nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔfo kuw no ho nkɔmmɔ.
pressCoverage.paragraph2: Nneɛma a wɔde kyerɛe ne nneɛma a wɔadi kan ayɛ no bi ne nsɛm a wɔkae wɔ Mercosul Bienal a ɛto so 13 no mu, gye a wogye tom fi Lumen Nkonimdi no mu, ne nea Brazil Ahunmu Nhwehwɛmu Asoɛe (INPE) paw.
